items.sentence: Tom had a big smile on his face when he said that.
Tom had a headache so he took a couple of aspirin.
Did Tom really want Mary to go to Boston with him?
Did you get a Christmas present for Tom this year?
Did you meet many interesting people at the party?
Tom was sure Mary didn\'t know how to drive a car.
I\'ve seen several accidents in front of my house.
If I were you, I wouldn\'t sing that kind of song.
Tom had the grim task of identifying Mary\'s body.
Tom had to do that even though he didn\'t want to.
